TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IResourceService

summary.span: 提供設計工具的介面，存取特定 資源型別的資源讀取器 (Reader) 和寫入器 (Writer)。

span.span: Provides an interface for designers to access resource readers and writers for specific resource types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資源寫入器或資源讀取器可以用來序列化或 deserialze 物件或根據指定的資料資源設定。A resource writer or resource reader can be used to serialize or deserialze objects or data according to the specified resource settings. ## Examples 下列範例將示範會使用設計工具讀取和寫入資源檔，才能設定相關聯的控制項的屬性。The following example demonstrates a designer that uses the to read from and write to resource files in order to configure a property of an associated control. [!code-cpp[IResourceServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IResourceServiceExample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IResourceServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IResourceServiceExample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IResourceServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IResourceServiceExample/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Resources.IResourceReader GetResourceReader(class System.Globalization.CultureInfo info) cil managed
Public Function GetResourceReader (info As CultureInfo) As IResourceReader

param.name: info
param.span: 資源的 ，會為其擷取資源讀取器。

span.span: The of the resource for which to retrieve a resource reader.

summary.span: 找到指定文化特性的資源讀取器 (Reader)，並將其傳回。

span.span: Locates the resource reader for the specified culture and returns it.

returns.span: 介面，包含文化特性的資源，或 (如果文化特性資源不存在)。

span.span: An interface that contains the resources for the culture, or if no resources for the culture exist.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有資源可與指定的文化特性的設計工具相關聯，則這個方法會傳回`null`。If no resources are associated with the designer for the specified culture, this method returns `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Resources.IResourceWriter GetResourceWriter(class System.Globalization.CultureInfo info) cil managed
Public Function GetResourceWriter (info As CultureInfo) As IResourceWriter

param.name: info
param.span: 要為其建立資源寫入器的資源的 。

span.span: The of the resource for which to create a resource writer.

summary.span: 找到指定文化特性 (Culture) 的資源寫入器，並將其傳回。

span.span: Locates the resource writer for the specified culture and returns it.

returns.span: 指定文化特性的 介面。

span.span: An interface for the specified culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立新的資源指定的文化特性，並終結現有的資源，如果已經存在。This method creates a new resource for the specified culture and destroys an existing resource, if one already exists.
